DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study evaluate whether tailored print material promote physical activity exercise , subsequently improve quality life fitness level among people multiple sclerosis ( MS ) . Research suggest routine physical activity beneficial people mild moderate MS . However , people MS may face many barrier engage regular physical activity . Prescribing home exercise program receiving tailor motivational print material may help people engage physical activity . Thus , investigator hope figure whether tailored print material use strategy promote physical activity improve physical function people MS .
DOC.brief_title: Promoting Physical Activity Behavior Persons With Multiple Sclerosis
DOC.detailed_description: The objective propose study understand method promote physical activity ( PA ) people multiple sclerosis ( MS ) . The investigator evaluate efficacy print-based multifaceted intervention consist prescribe exercise program teach self-management strategy .
DOC.criteria: A physicianconfirmed diagnosis relapsingremitting MS Exercise 150 minute per week Pregnant Metabolic cardiopulmonary disease put patient high risk engage home exercise program ( patient control diabetes high blood pressure still consider eligible ) Four fall past 6 month Be able walk 25 foot without cane Severe cognitive deficit Unable read 6th grade level A condition besides MS lead hospitalization past year
